meanings.definition: Not conforming to the laws or wishes of a god or gods.
meanings.sent1: The ungodlier behavior of the rebellious teenager worried his parents.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her ungodlier attitude towards traditional beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The ungodlier antics of the mischievous puppy amused the whole family.
meanings.sent4: His ungodlier actions spoke louder than any words of defiance.
meanings.sent5: The storm's ungodlier rage shook the very foundations of the house.

meanings.definition: Lacking reverence or respect for a deity.
meanings.sent1: The ungodlier remarks made by the disrespectful student shocked the teacher.
meanings.sent2: Her ungodlier attitude towards the sacred ceremony offended many attendees.
meanings.sent3: The ungodlier behavior of the cat towards the temple's statue was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The ungodlier disregard for tradition was evident in his every action.
meanings.sent5: The ungodlier silence in the church made the atmosphere tense and uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: More wicked or sinful than others.
meanings.sent1: The ungodlier intentions of the villain were revealed in the final act.
meanings.sent2: His ungodlier deeds haunted him in the dead of night.
meanings.sent3: The ungodlier choices he made led him down a dark path.
meanings.sent4: The ungodlier nature of the crime sent shockwaves through the community.
meanings.sent5: The ungodlier presence in the room made everyone uneasy.
